greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of parts in all partitions of n with largest multiplicity three.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..5000
formula: a(n) ~ log(2) * exp(Pi*sqrt(n/2)) / (Pi * 2^(1/4) * n^(1/4)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 25 2018
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, [1, 0], `if`(i<1, 0,
mathematica: a /@ Range[3, 60] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 13 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 11 2018
